changelog.change: Added compatibility for the GOG release.
Updated IL Mode to match new rules.
Added IL auto-resets. Will not auto-reset if you have Reset unchecked.
Returned the "End" setting.
Fixed ILs not starting.
[5.1.1] Fixed issue causing LiveSplit to crash and be unrecoverable.
Reinstated level load splitting
Redesigned and refactored settings code to fix disappearing settings
Changed reset code to remove unintended autoresets
Made Skyway splitting at the end of WD more generous
Removed level load splitting, added IL Mode, and merged the "Split" and "End" settings into one (Just known as "Split")
Added a new memory version which will allow more players to use the autosplitter (Wingspan)
Fixed all anomalies with Heart of the Bastion splitting. Feel free to talk to Zia and Rucks at will!
Added 64-bit support, thanks to DevilSquirrel. No longer need to use LiveSplit32 to run the Autosplitter.
Added Windows 10 support. Hacked in a (temporary?) fix for random early splitting in the Heart of the Bastion.
Fixed a bug where the Skyway method would not split at the end of Tazal Terminals.
Fixed some settings not properly saving. I have no idea why this fix worked.
Fixed Sole Regret splitting to always use the level load method. (Other method doesn't work!)
Readded splitting at Rock in the Sky. Fixed splitting at the end of Wharf District.
Added the Skyway-split style. Removed the option to split after the Sole Regret. (It will probably return in the future.)
Fixed a bug that caused splitting when loading the Rippling Walls if the Reset setting was disabled.
Testing autoupdating.
Fix file path for autoupdating.
Fix Settings saving and allow for autoupdating.
